channel.title: [PI] Spawning jad causes disconnect due to client
channel.description:
Hey everyone I have tried to fix this problem to no avail and I was wonder if anyone else has a fix to this problem. When I spawn the npc 2745 which is jad, it disconnects and I could spawn any other monster fine except for some giant npcs. I have tried to spawn it in the cfg file but all it does is cause repeatedly disconnects. Is there any fix? People are telling me that models are outdated but I don't know if it is because spawning other monsters it also has a problem.
Thanks
Edited: I found the problem it was because of the client it didn't load the models correctly and when I use a new client it works, but I am looking for how to replace the models on the old client because its already fully coded.
the client with the messed up jad gives me this error when i spawn him-
Error: T2 - 65,81,208 - 21,2963,3388 - 5,-98,72,2,-32,0,-85,-81,-1,-32,0,32,-128 ,0,32,-128,0,32,-128,0,0,
